Title: Kung Fu Panda
Writer: Jonathan Aibel (screenplay), Glenn Berger (screenplay), Ethan Reiff (story), Cyrus Voris (story)
Actors: Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane
Plot: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 37 nominations.
